comments.body: I feel `Nested Grouping Analytics` looks confusing because `GROUPING SETS` only accepts the nested cases.

> I feel `Nested Grouping Analytics` looks confusing because `GROUPING SETS` only accepts the nested cases.

So let's make these two case separated?
Ah, okay. on second thought, `**Mixed/Nested Grouping Analytics**` looks okay (I couldn't come up with a better title...)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +96,100 @@    The N elements of a `CUBE` specification results in 2^N `GROUPING SETS`.

* **Mixed/Nested Grouping Analytics**

    A GROUP BY clause can include multiple `group_expression`s and multiple `CUBE|ROLLUP|GROUPING SETS`s.
